text: Coming clean. Kailyn Lowry shared her relationship regrets and revealed that she was “ hooking up ” with ex - husband Javi Marroquin while they considered a reconciliation. The Teen Mom 2 star opened up about her relationship with Marroquin in a series of tweets on Saturday, June 2. “ Javi & I talked about getting back together at one point. Why? I don ’ t know because we both knew we didn ’ t want to & it would never work, ” she revealed. “ I regret even having those conversations. I regret filming about it. And hooking up w him as I know people from the reunion leaked that. ” 2 - Javi & i talked about getting back together at one point. Why? I don ’ t know because we both knew we didn ’ t want to
